link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Total shares debt and free reserve =(i) Paid-up Equity Capital + (ii) Preference shares to be compulsorily convertible into equity + (iii) Perpetual Debt Instrument (Not to exceed 15% of Aggregate Tier I Capital as on March 31 of the previous year) + (a) Statutory / Spl. Reserves Under Sec. 45IC of RBI Act, 1934. + (b) General Reserves + (c) Share Premium + (d) Capital Reserves (representing surplus on sale of assets held in separate account) + (e) Debenture Redemption Reserve + (f) Capital Redemption Reserve + (g) Credit Balance in Profit and Loss Account + (h) Other free reserves (to be specified))" do not tally.

Identity "Total =((v) Accumulated balance of loss + (vi) Deferred Revenue Expenditure + (vii) Deferred Tax Asset (Net) + (viii) Other Intangible Assets + (ix) Others (to be specified in remarks column))" do not tally.
Identity "Owned fund = Paid up Capital+ perpetual debt + free reserves - Total adjustments to calculate owned funds" do not tally.

Identity "Total = (xi) 50% of the unrealized appreciation in the book value of quoted investments as at the date of last audited Balance sheet plus (xii) Increase if any, in the equity share capital since the date of the last audited balance sheet" do not tally.

Identity "(xv) Adjusted Net Worth should be equal to ((x) Owned Fund + Total - (xiii) Diminution in the aggregate book value of quoted investments - (xiv) Reduction, if any, in the equity share capital since the date of the last audited balance sheet)" do not tally.
If reported value for "(h) Other free reserves (to be specified)" is not zero, then please provide remarks in "Remarks" column and if value is zero, then remarks are not required.
If reported value for "(ix) Others (to be specified in remarks column)" is not zero, then please provide remarks in "Remarks" column and if value is zero, then remarks are not required.
